trans-unit.source: Represents a column header in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的列标题<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
trans-unit.target: 创建此单元格的精确副本。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，表示克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHeaderCell"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessible object for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的可访问对象的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果不显式调用 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它时将会调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>引用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 要获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>，你必须添加对引用`Accessibility`随.NET Framework 一起安装的程序集。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.AccessibilityObject%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 检索要将复制到的单元格格式化的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, this method is called by the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> method to retrieve a clipboard-formatted value that represents the cell.
trans-unit.target: 根据值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>由该控件的控件，调用此方法是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A>方法来检索表示单元格的剪贴板格式的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.GetClipboardContent%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The position-related parameters of this method indicate where this cell is located in the table of data representing the region defined by the selected cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的位置相关参数指示此单元格表示定义中的所选单元格的区域的数据的表中的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the cell's position, formatting information may be returned by this method in addition to the cell value.
trans-unit.target: 根据单元格的位置，格式设置信息可能返回此方法，除了单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, the HTML format for a cell in the first column of a row will include the tag that indicates the beginning of a row.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某一行的第一列中的单元格的 HTML 格式将包括标记，该值指示行的开头。

trans-unit.source: The supported clipboard formats include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 支持的剪贴板格式包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.CommaSeparatedValue?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Html?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.UnicodeText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Text?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the row containing the cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含该单元格的行的从零开始索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该单元格由选定的单元格; 定义的区域的第一列中否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is the last column of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该单元格由选定的单元格; 定义的区域的最后一列否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the first row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该单元格在第一行中的选定单元格; 定义的区域否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the cell is in the last row of the region defined by the selected cells; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示该单元格由选定的单元格; 定义的区域的最后一行中否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current format string of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 当前单元格的格式字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object> that represents the value of the cell to copy to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object>，表示要将复制到的单元格的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Returns the bounding rectangle that encloses the cell's content area, which is calculated using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object and cell style.
trans-unit.target: 返回环绕单元格的内容区域，使用指定计算的边框<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>对象和单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: The size of the cell's contents is computed dynamically when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此方法时，将动态计算单元格的内容的大小。

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A> property is read.
trans-unit.target: 当在内部调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>属性为只读。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContentBounds%2A>

trans-unit.source: The graphics context for the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的图形上下文。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>要应用到单元格。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that bounds the cell's contents.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>用于限定单元格的内容。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the inherited shortcut menu for the specified row.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的行的继承的快捷菜单。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的行的索引<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref> 。

trans-unit.source: The index must be -1 to indicate the row of column headers.
trans-unit.target: 索引必须为-1 以指示列标题的行。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> of the column headers if one exists; otherwise, the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref> inherited from <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"> </xref>的列标题，如果存在; 否则为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStrip"></xref>继承自<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the style applied to the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于该单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> that inherits its settings from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> objects returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>继承其设置从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>按<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersDefaultCellStyle%2A>返回的对象</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be populated with the inherited cell style.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>要使用的继承的单元格样式填充。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include inherited colors in the returned cell style; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>包括继承的颜色中返回的单元格样式中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that includes the style settings of the cell inherited from the cell's parent row, column, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>包括继承从单元格的父行的单元格的样式设置列中，和<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 计算的首选的大小，以像素为单位的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to draw the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>表示单元格的样式。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based row index of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的从零开始的行索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell's maximum allowable size.
trans-unit.target: 该单元格的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the preferred size, in pixels, of the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示的首选的大小，以像素为单位的单元格。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: The value contained in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Paints the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制当前<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于绘制单元格。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> ，它表示的区域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> ，需要重新绘制。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>包含正在绘制的单元格的边界。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 当前所绘制单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref>指定的单元格状态的值。

trans-unit.source: The data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 正在绘制的单元格的数据。

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: 正在绘制的单元格格式化的数据。

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 与单元格关联的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>包含有关单元格的格式和样式信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref>包含正在绘制的单元格的边框样式。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values that specifies which parts of the cell need to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 按位组合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref>指定需要绘制单元格的哪些部分的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the cell's parent row.
trans-unit.target: 单元格的父行索引。

trans-unit.source: The cell value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的单元格值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value has been set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果未设置值;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: rowIndex is not -1.
trans-unit.target: rowIndex不是-1。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which sort glyph is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值显示的排序标志符号。

trans-unit.source: This property is set automatically for columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 对于具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>列自动设置此属性

trans-unit.source: You must set this property yourself when sorting by columns with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须自己设置此属性时按与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A>列进行排序

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> value representing the current glyph.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref>值，该值表示当前的标志符号。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效指定的值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property, the value of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.OwningColumn*> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView*> property of the cell is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性，其中任何值时<> *1> 属性或<> *1> 的单元格的属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- When changing the value of this property, the specified value is not <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref> and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*> property of the owning column is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-时更改此属性的值，指定的值不是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SortOrder"></xref>和的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>所属列的属性是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串表示形式的单元格。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示当前单元格。
